title: How to Get Punkleton in My Singing Monsters: Pro Tips & Tricks

steps.title: Obtain some parent monsters.
steps.content: Obtain some parent monsters. To get a Punkleton, you'll need a Bowgart and a T-Rox . [1] X Research source You'll use the same combination whether you're trying to get a normal or Rare Punkleton. [2] X Research source However, remember that you can only get Punkleton during one of the following events: Spooktacle season An Out of Season event Seasonal Shanty (but only if you already have a Punkleton)

steps.title: Level the parents to level 4.
steps.content: Level the parents to level 4. Monsters must be at least level 4 to breed, so level up your parent monsters if they're not already at least level 4. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Upgrade your Breeding Structures, if you wish.
steps.content: Upgrade your Breeding Structures, if you wish. While not necessary, you can upgrade your Breeding Structures to reduce breeding times by 25%. You can upgrade your structure by spending 25 diamonds. You can also add Wishing Torches around your Breeding Structure to help increase the odds of a rare monster being bred. [4] X Research source Wishing Torches can be lit for 24 hours by paying 2 diamonds or be lit permanently by paying 100 diamonds.

steps.title: Breed the parent monsters on Plant Island during Spooktacle season.
steps.content: Breed the parent monsters on Plant Island during Spooktacle season. Once you're ready to breed your monsters, put them in the Breeding Structure. A Punkleton egg looks like a pumpkin. [5] X Research source Spooktacle season happens in early October to the beginning of November. It's also celebrated in late April as an Out of Season Event. [6] X Research source To get a Rare Punkleton, you'll need to wait until a breeding window opens up during the Spooktacle season. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for your Punkleton to hatch.
steps.content: Wait for your Punkleton to hatch. By default, it takes 18 hours for a Punkleton egg to hatch. If you've got enhanced Breeding Structures, however, it will hatch in 13 hours and 30 minutes.
